title: Jobify
description: Jobify is a user-friendly job board app. It serves as a platform that connects job seekers with potential employers. With Jobify, users can effortlessly browse through job listings, and submit applications with ease.

title: QuizIT
description: Quiz It is an online quiz maker Single Page Application (SPA). It is designed to gather IT professionals and enthusiasts to participate in quizzes related to various IT concepts. Whether you're looking to test your knowledge or contribute by creating quizzes.

title: TSF foundation
description: ðŸ”­ Crafting a full stack web application focused on TSF Foundation's mission. Utilizing Next.js to build a dynamic platform that seamlessly connects purpose and technology.

title: IIYADA
description: iiyada is a Desktop clinic management system developed using Visual Studio 2022. The primary language used is C#, and ADO.NET is utilized for MSSQL database manipulation. The design is enhanced using the Guna framework.

title: Healthy Farm
description: Introducing a comprehensive e-commerce platform devoted to organic living. Responsive interface that smoothly adapts to various screen sizes. This project was powered by VITE for optimized performance and development efficiency.

title: GPT3
description: My first single-page web project, where design meets simplicity. Crafted with Create React App (CRA), this creation is all about aesthetics and layout design.

title: Play play
description: Discover laughter with our Meme, Jokes, Riddles, and More Generator! Crafted using HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript, I used APIs to serve up a dynamic selection of entertaining content.
